  • Constructor Details

    • GodCard

      public GodCard​(GodCard.GodsType godType, GodCard.WhereToApply whereToApply, GodCard.ToWhomIsApplied toWhomIsApplied)
      Constructor: create a god with its name, description and id
      Parameters:
      godType - name of the god of the card
      toWhomIsApplied - indicates whether the god card's power influences the owner's turn, or the opponent's turn
      whereToApply - indicates which phase of the turn the power will influence

      Returns:
      to whom it must be applied

    • getWhereToApply

      public GodCard.WhereToApply getWhereToApply()
      Method to query when the god card must be applied
      Returns:
      where it must be applied from an enum

    • AllowExtraMove

      public boolean AllowExtraMove()
      Method to call in order to know if the god card allows an extra move
      Returns:
      true if it allows it, otherwise false
